execution
Class PersistentExecutionManager

java.lang.Object
  execution.PersistentExecutionManager

public class PersistentExecutionManager
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for managing virtual machine executions. This class is responsible to schedule virtual machine startups and stops. The process is: given a virtual machine and a time t, this class ensures that this virtual machine is going to be turn on for a time t The virtual machine only is stoped when the time t is burnt-out or when the user sends a request to stop it. If this physical machine is turned off, then the next time the physical machine starts the virtual machine will be powered on.
To schedule the virtual machine turn off we used a Timer that manage a collection of TimerTask objects, each timer task is responsible for stoping one virtual machine

Field Summary
private static java.lang.String executionsFile
          The file that contains the powered virtual machines and its execution times
private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Schedule> programedShutdowns
          A map containing a map between virtual machine ids and its scheduled TimerTask to stop it.
private static java.util.Timer timer
          Timer used to schedule shutdown events

Method Detail

loadExecutions

public static void loadExecutions()
Loads the stored virtual machine executions when the physical machine start. Each loaded execution used to turn on the corresponding virtual machine

addExecution

public static void addExecution(java.lang.String vmxroute,
                                java.lang.String hypervisorPath,
                                java.lang.String vmIP,
                                java.lang.String id,
                                long executionTime,
                                int vmCores,
                                int vmMemory,
                                int hypervisorName,
                                java.lang.String persistent,
                                java.lang.String checkPoint)
Adds a new virtual machine execution to be managed by this class.

Parameters:
vmxroute - The route of the virtual machine to be managed
hypervisorPath - The hypervisor that must be used to start and stop the given virtual machine
vmIP - The ip of the virtual machine that is being deployed
id - The id of the new managed virtual machine execution
executionTime - The time that the machine must stay turned on
vmCores - The number of cores that must be configured on the virtual machine to deploy it
vmMemory - The RAM memory size that must be configured on the virtual machine to deploy it
hypervisorName - The type of hypervisor that must be used to deploy this virtual machine
persistent - If the virtual machine must persist its files after machine stop or if it must rollback to its initial status
checkPoint - The name of the checkpoint that must be taken to secure this virtual machine execution, null if no checkpoint is needed

removeExecution

public static java.lang.String removeExecution(int hypervisorName,
                                               java.lang.String vmPath,
                                               java.lang.String hypervisorPath,
                                               java.lang.String id)
Stops a virtual machine and removes it represeting execution object

Parameters:
hypervisorName - The hypervisor that must be used to stop this virtual machine
vmPath - The path of the virtual machine to be stoped
hypervisorPath - The path of the hypervisor exec that must be used to stop the machine
id - The id of the virtual machine execution to be removed
Returns:
